title: Advanced Analytics Course Using Scientific Simulation Software

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and data analysis competency
context.additional_context: Workplace-oriented science simulation software proficiency enhancement program for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can replicate complex scientific phenomena from industrial settings through 3D modeling using scientific simulation software.
Learners can submit quantitative analyses of data collected in virtual laboratory environments as formal reports.
Learners can demonstrate variable control and result interpretation skills in simulation-based experimental design through project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
